comments.body: optional: consider this as two methods: DetachVolumeSafely() and DetachVolumeNow() - they can call into a common func with a bool argument in the back.  optional.
I am thinking we can have some utility function to construct those similar glog which will reduce quite some lines from this big function. But we can do that later.

comments.body: Warning: you drop the error here.
Yep, this is on purpose. This error (pending operation) is expected to happen a lot in the normal course of execution and is not worth logging.
